titles.title: Preventing SBA Assistance from Going to China Act of 2023
Preventing SBA Assistance from Going to China Act of 2023
A bill to prohibit certain business concerns from receiving assistance from the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

bill.summary:
Preventing SBA Assistance from Going to China Act of 2023
This bill prohibits the Small Business Administration from providing aid, counsel, or assistance to a small business concern that (1) is headquartered in China, or (2) has more than 25% of voting stock owned by citizens of China.
